channel.title: Model Problems
channel.description:
Whenever i have the item in my inventory my client crashes.
i have added my item correctly into my client, ive done the server sides to it aswell and ive done add model #### .
so can anyone help me fix this error please!
Thanks
p.s im using galkons client base

item.title: Model Problems
item.dc:creator: @bokiller5 bokiller5
item.description:
@bokiller5 wrote:

[quote=“EazzyUk, post:3, topic:250208”]i got my ints off of a tutorial, so im not sure.

here they are

if(i == 7088) //Dark Shield { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 7089; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 25; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 7088; class8.anInt200 = 7088; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Dark Shield";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A shield of corrupted by 'Dark Spirits'.".getBytes();//examin info }[/quote]

i no wat the problems is it cuz the model number is to high u need to lower it make it like around 0-2100 ok

Read full topic

item.title: Model Problems
item.dc:creator: @goothan38 goothan38
item.description:
@goothan38 wrote:

From what I know, this section is only for posting models, not help threads. Good luck next time.
